publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2298.2 John Swinburne:Older People—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2298) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end “, accepts that, despite these actions, there remains a growing problem of the ageing population demographic timebomb and believes that, without immediate, positive Executive action, many older people will continue to be adversely affected and die in this wealthy society in the 21 st century.” Supported by: Margo MacDonald*
